sourcesContent:
import {React,useState} from'react' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import FormControl from 'react-bootstrap/FormControl'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import InputGroup from 'react-bootstrap/InputGroup'; import './register.css'; const Register=()=> { const [user,setUser]=useState({ name:null, email:null, phone:null, password:null, cpassword:null }); let name,value; const handleInputs=(e)=>{ console.log(e); name=e.target.name; value=e.target.value; setUser({...user,[name]:value}); } return ( <>

REGISTER YOURSELF WITH ANNANDATA

User Name Email address We'll never share your email with anyone else. Email address Phone Number Your contact number should be 10 digits long. Password Confirm Password confirm password must match your set password.

If already Registered,Back to Login!

) } export default Register;
